p: From a molecular diagnose viewpoint, 72 and 20 percent of PCSK1 pathogenic variants were located in the region coding for the catalytic domain and P domain, respectively. Sixty-eight percent of variants were deleterious, including 10 nonsense variants, 3 frameshift variants and 4 splice sites variants ( Figure 3). However, there was no apparent genotype-phenotype correlation between individuals (Pepin et al., 2019).
